titleStmt.title: The charge of schism renewed against the separatists in answer to the renewer of that pretended peaceable design, which is falsly call'd, An answer to Dr. Stillingfleet's late sermon.
titleStmt.author: S. T. (Samuel Thomas), 1627-1693.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
